course_title: Topics: Environmental Studies: Nature's Benefits to People
class_notes: Pre-requisite: ENVS 120 or ENVS 130 or ENVS 140 or ENVS_OX 131
course_description: Variable topics that are offered as irregular courses. Past course topics have included: Finding Place: Technology, Stories, and the Environment; Introduction to Botany; Environment, Health, and Development; Conservation and Development; Booms and Busts in Resources of Georgia; and Paleoecology.
schedule_location: M 1pm-3:45pm in Math & Science Center - W501
sections: Class Nbr: 3396, Section #: 3, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 1-3:45p, Instructor: E. Lonsdorf, Status: Open
